latestIgtvVideos.caption:
Meet Angela @angela.das14, a Minimalist user, who shared her skincare journey with us as she spoke about her skin concerns, mistakes, insecurities, and how she overcame that. And if she can find a solution, you can too, cause
#YouAreNotAlone

"Minimalist has been a lifesaver. I’ve had melasma for years and I thought I’d have to live with it forever.

But the products I’ve been using have made a huge difference. They’re easy to use, easy on the pocket and backed by science. Plus, the team has been super helpful. They helped me identify my key skin issues and suggested the layering routine which I have been following."

We love to see progress like this!!

@jaideep_bhide has dry skin and wanted to address melasma, photo ageing, pigmentation & fine lines. Here's his skincare routine. All the products mentioned below are from Minimalist.

* 𝗔𝗠: (𝗘𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆𝗱𝗮𝘆)
Cleanser & Toner > Hyaluronic Acid > Alpha Arbutin > Vitamin C > Moisturizer > Sunscreen

* 𝗣𝗠: (𝗗𝗮𝘆 𝟭)
Cleanser & Toner > Lactic Acid > Alpha Arbutin > Rosehip Oil

* 𝗣𝗠: (𝗗𝗮𝘆 𝟮)
Cleanser & Toner > Hyaluronic Acid > Tranexamic Acid > Rosehip Oil

He follows both the Day 1 & Day 2 PM routine alternatively.

He used all the right ingredients to fight sun damage, melasma & pigmentation. But every skin is different! If you have similar concerns and want to start your skin journey, please reach out to us. Our team will help you curate a customized routine as per your skin type and skin needs.

Feel free to reach out to us in DMs or comments below. See ya!

#BeforeAndAfter #SkincareJourney #BeMinimalist #Minimalist

We’re heartbroken by the inhumanity witnessed in Pahalgam.
No words can heal the pain of those who’ve lost their loved ones.
But we stand with them — in grief, in solidarity, and in quiet resolve.

Justice must follow.
But for now, we hold space for the pain.

If you know of any verified NGOs working directly with victims,
please share them with us — we’d be grateful to amplify and support.
💔

#Pahalgam #InSolidarity #MinimalistForHumanity
latestPosts.alt: Photo by Minimalist on April 23, 2025. May be a graphic of poster and text that says 'Enough. We are heartbroken by the inhumanity in Pahalgam. This senseless act of violence has shaken us to the core. It must stop.'.

childPosts.alt: Photo by Minimalist on April 23, 2025. May be a graphic of poster and text that says 'Enough. We are heartbroken by the inhumanity in Pahalgam. This senseless act of violence has shaken us to the core. It must stop.'.
Photo by Minimalist on April 23, 2025. May be an image of text that says 'Minimalist stands in solidarity with the victims and their families in this time of grief.'.

Photo by Minimalist on April 23, 2025. May be an image of poster and text that says 'We are working to identify credible NGOs on the ground to ensure help reaches swiftly and responsibly. If you know of any trusted organizations directly supporting victims, please share them with us we'll publish their links so others in the community can support as well.'.

Photo by Minimalist on April 23, 2025. May be an image of text that says 'This is not a time for commerce. It a time for mourning, reflection, and collective care. As a mark of respect and heartfelt solidarity, we are pausing all activities on our website www.beminimalist.co for the next 24 hours, effective immediately. Our offices will also remain closed today as we stand united in grief.'.

Photo by Minimalist on April 23, 2025. May be an image of text that says 'Our hearts ache with the nation. We mourn with the families. We remain hopeful that justice will prevail. And we reaffirm our commitment to stand by those in pain- now, and always.'.

Every step told a story, and we were lucky to listen. 
From laughter with friends to first-time experiences, #JustWalkIndia Walkathon was full of heart—and sunscreen! ☀

Thanks to everyone who stopped by, said hi, and let us be part of their journey.
Because no matter the reason, every step deserves protection.

Don’t let the fear of sun stop you.
#Minimalist. #HideNothing

Abhijeet’s journey is one of curiosity and balance.

From diving deep into research to shaping young minds as a teacher, his story is a blend of passion, perseverance, and continuous learning. 
Beyond books and labs, he finds joy in movement—whether it’s a workout after a long day or moments spent in nature. And when it comes to self-care, skincare has played a part in making him feel confident in his own skin.

Skin & Beyond is a celebration of real people like Abhijeet, their incredible stories, and the small yet meaningful ways they choose to care for themselves every day.

Here’s to Abhijeet and everyone who inspires us to embrace knowledge, growth, and self-care in all its forms.

Have your own story to share? Fill out the form in our bio for a chance to be featured in Skin & Beyond. Let’s celebrate you.

Did you know Holi is a blend of Neurochemistry, Physics and much more? 
From Dopamine spikes to Adrenaline surges, we're breaking down the Science of Celebration. 

Swipe now to learn more >>
latestPosts.alt: Photo by Minimalist on March 13, 2025. May be a graphic of poster, magazine and text that says 'Holi It's not just a festival, it's dynamic interplay of Neurochemistry, Physics & Color science.'.

May be an image of text that says 'Dopamine Kinetics of Color Contact Gulal contact triggers Mechanoreceptors in your skin, leading to a rapid dopamine release in the brain's Ventral Tegmental area. This neurochemical burst is why Holi's touch feels so exhilarating. NH2 Ho OH Dopamine, the feel good hormone'.

Photo by Minimalist on March 13, 2025. May be a graphic of poster and text that says 'Adrenaline & Fluid Dynamics Pichkari Action! The splash of water from the pichkari triggers our body's stress response, releasing Adrenaline Hypothalamus in the brain signals adrenal glands Adrenaline surges This Adrenaline surge fuels the excitement of the chase, and play during Holi'.

Photo by Minimalist on March 13, 2025. May be a graphic of poster and text that says 'Serotonin Photochemistry Sunlight reaches the Retinal Ganglion Cells in our eyes ↓ These send α signal to the brain's mood center leading to the production of happy chemical called Serotonin I This increase in Serotonin makes นร a feel happier!'.

Photo by Minimalist on March 13, 2025. May be a graphic of poster and text that says 'Oxytocin & Interpersonal Bonds Skin-to-skin Skin- contact during Holi triggers Oxytocin release. This neuropeptide enhances social bonding, making interactions feel more connected and joyful.'.

Photo by Minimalist on March 13, 2025. CEH,,NO2 (Dopamine) C,HAMO3 3 (Adrenaline) HOLI CASHN2O122 2 (Oxytocin) CPH3ΝΟ (Serotonin) Physics drives the chaos; Biology feels it.'.

latestPosts.caption:
Dandruff is a common struggle, but it doesn’t have to be.
Our new Anti-Dandruff Shampoo 3.5% is a science-backed, effective formula that targets the root cause of dandruff. 

With Piroctone Olamine, Climbazole, and Salicylic Acid, it starts working from the first wash—reducing flakes, calming irritation, and restoring scalp balance without stripping moisture.

For a healthier scalp,
Shop Now at www.beminimalist.co
